experience.name: CIBC
description: Implemented an automation script to install and configure universal forwarders, integrating team metadata and binding ip to block and monitor remote access to internal resources. Mock REST API test with cURL calls with a runtime of 10 seconds.

Collaborated in Designing and Implementing a monitoring script to notify internal teams' Slunk usage over email notification leveraging Python and Splunk lib to retrieve ingestion quotas per day leading to 40% cost reduction in Splunk license

Delivered customized data reports with search head querying to people leaders, utilizing Splunk Dashboard Visualization, forecasting end-of-month license usage while examining key metrics and insights to investigate patterns in collected data.

Designed and developed a migration script for older Splunk version to seamlessly transition Splunk Version 9 with mock API tests to resulting in prevention of data duplication, data loss and data corruption in Indexers search logs

experience.name: Full Creative
